definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: saw (NH id., perh. from its harsh dragging sound)—[[מְגֵרָה]] 2Sa 12:31 a + 2 t.; pl. [[מְגֵרוֹת]] 1Ch 20:3 (< [[מַגְזְרוֹת]] 2Sa 12:31 b)—saw, used in cutting stone [[מְגׁרָרוֹת בַּמְּגֵרָה]] 1Ki 7:9; used in torture (or as tools for enforced labour) of captives 2Sa 12:31 a 1Ch 20:3 a.
